1.speaker: A
sentence: How long will It take to get the shopping done.

2.speaker: B
sentence: I'm almost done. It'll take just a second.
나는 거의 다 됐어. 그건 단지 얼마 안걸릴꺼야.

3.speaker: A
sentence: I've had it. My back is killing me.
난 질렸어. 등 때문에 아파 죽겠어.

4.speaker: B
sentence: You'd better go get some rest in the lounge.
너 가는게 좋겠다 좀 쉬러 라운지에.

5.speaker: A
sentence: Two hours have passed in the blink of an eye.
두 시간이 지났어 눈 깜빡할 세에.
